title: Alexis Haines On How She Recovered From Addiction, Jail, Reality TV, & A Life Of Abuse
itunes:title: Alexis Haines On How She Recovered From Addiction, Jail, Reality TV, & A Life Of Abuse
description:
#196: On this episode we sit down with Alexis Haines to discuss how she conquered a troubled life of abuse and addiction and came out the other side. Alexis struggled for years as an addict which lead to many hardships including jail and the famous reality TV bling ring fiasco. On this episode we discuss how she conquered her hardships and came out on top.
